required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

id_info.org_study_id: thin cross- section of CT ZYP

clinical_study.brief_title: The Guidance of Thin Cross- Section of CT in Anatomic Segmentectomy
clinical_study.official_title: The Guidance of Thin Cross- Section of CT in Anatomic Segmentectomy With or Without 3-dimensional Computed Tomography Lung Simulation

lead_sponsor.agency: The Second Hospital of Shandong University

clinical_study.source: The Second Hospital of Shandong University

brief_summary.textblock: Three-dimensional (3D) simulation of pulmonary vessels and the space between the lesion and adjacent tissues is regarded improving the safety and accuracy of video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery (VATS) for segmentectomy for ground glass opacity (GGO) in lung. However, not every thoracic surgeon can handle the technique, in addition, the 3D reconstruction originate from the thin CT scan. Actually, the investigators found that, the reading and comprehension of the thin cross- section of CT can guide the accurate anatomic segmentectomy in most situations. The investigators designed a retrospective study to compare the reading of thin cross- section of CT with 3D reconstruction or without 3D reconstruction during the guidance of anatomic segmentectomy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the first time of thin cross- section of CT is presented to the end of surgery, within 7 days
primary_outcome.description: the planning time for anatomic segmentectomy before surgery, including the time- cost of the decision making and the planning time for surgery

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the day of being hospitalized to the day of surgery, within 5 days
primary_outcome.description: days before surgery after being hospitalized

primary_outcome.time_frame: from beginning to the end of surgery, up to 180 minutes
primary_outcome.description: the duration of the operation time
review time of the 3D reconstruction or the thin cross- section of CT during surgery
the days of air leakage after surgery
the incidence of pneumonia after surgery
the incidence of atelectasis after surgery
bleeding during anatomic segmentectomy, through the operation, an average of 100 ml

arm_group.arm_group_label: group of thin cross- section of CT
arm_group.description: Anatomic Segmentectomy with the Guidance of Thin Cross- Section of CT
Anatomic Segmentectomy with the Guidance of 3D simulation

intervention.intervention_name: Cross- Section of CT Guided Anatomic Segmentectomy
intervention.description: The anatomic segmentectomy is base on the reading and comprehension of Cross- Section of CT.
intervention.arm_group_label: group of thin cross- section of CT

intervention.description: The anatomic segmentectomy is base on the overview of 3D simulation of pulmonary structure.

overall_official.affiliation: The Second Hospital of Shandong University

facility.name: The Second Hospital of Shandong University
